content: I have just seen a game of checkers, played by Françualdo Gonçalves de Souza in 1997, more beautiful than the chess game called Immortal, played by Adolf Anderssen in 1895.
translations: ita:Ho appena visto una partita a dama, giocata da Françualdo Gonçalves de Souza nel 1997, più bella della partita a scacchi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
